scripts.release:all: npm run prepare:release && node scripts/release.mjs all
scripts.release:dry: npm run prepare:release && DRY_RUN=1 node scripts/release.mjs all
scripts.test: npm run test:classes && npm run test:syntax && node scripts/verify-deps.mjs && node scripts/verify-prefixes.mjs && node scripts/verify-tokens.mjs && node scripts/verify-dark.mjs
scripts.version:patch: npm run prepare:version patch && node scripts/bump-version.mjs patch
scripts.version:minor: npm run prepare:version minor && node scripts/bump-version.mjs minor
scripts.version:major: npm run prepare:version major && node scripts/bump-version.mjs major
scripts.version:check: npm run version:check:packages && npm run version:check:root && npm run version:sync
scripts.validate: npm run test:classes && npm run version:check
scripts.ready: npm run prepare:release && npm run release:dry
